attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a democracy, and in a democracy the people should be allowed to elect their own Prime Minister, President, or equivalent. The people have not been allowed to vote for Gordon Brown as PM, and therefore he should not be appointed to the position. So would the Prime Minister please call a General Election for when he decides to leave office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
